name: Uganda Museum
description: Showcases Uganda's cultural heritage with historical artifacts.

name: Kasubi Tombs
description: UNESCO World Heritage Site and burial grounds for Buganda kings.

name: Lake Victoria
description: Africa's largest lake offering beautiful beaches and water activities.

name: Ndere Cultural Centre
description: Celebrates Uganda's diverse cultures through music and dance.

name: Uganda Wildlife Center
description: Zoo and conservation center showcasing Uganda's wildlife.

name: Bahai Temple
description: Africa's only Bahai temple with beautiful gardens.

name: Owino Market
description: Largest market in Uganda offering everything from produce to clothing.

name: Gaddafi Mosque
description: Uganda's largest mosque with capacity for 15,000 worshippers.
